Class PasswordTool

java.lang.Object
PasswordTool
public class PasswordTool extends Object
Provides password validation and evaluation. Validation checks company policy; evaluation computes a score and strength label.

  • Method Details

    • validate

      public int validate(String input)
      Computes the password score using: (3 * lowercase) + (5 * uppercase) + (6 * special). Whitespace is not counted as special.
      Parameters:
      input - password to evaluate
      Returns:
      computed score

    • getStrength

      public String getStrength(int score)
      Converts a score into a strength label based on the assignment parameters.
      Parameters:
      score - computed password score
      Returns:
      strength label

    • inBounds

      public boolean inBounds(String input)
      Checks whether a password meets company policy: minimum length, at least one digit, and at least one special character. Whitespace does not count as special.
      Parameters:
      input - password to validate
      Returns:
      true if the password meets policy, otherwise false
